description:
Pixel Devil and the Broken Cartridge is an old school pixel art platformer. The protagonist ends up in the world of 8-bit video games. Help him get through challenging levels, beat various bosses, learn new skills, and find the villain behind the abduction of young women. But more importantly, together youâ€™ll have to find the answer to the big question: why have the characters of old school video games suddenly turned evil?

 KEY FEATURES:
Awesome old school
Awesome pixel graphics
Awesome levels
Awesome bosses
Awesome 8-bit music
The nineties called, they want their awesomeness back!
name: Pixel Devil and the Broken Cartridge
